item.description:
Ladies- come and join Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club for a fabulous and free evening at California Closets gorgeous Brighton showroom. Guests will enjoy a complimentary wine tasting, cocktails, appetizers, Pretzel Crisps and Hint Water. Darren Young, a strolling magician, will be entertaining the crowd! There will also be a DJ and the famous pink carpet walk-off for the Best-in-Shoe competition- so break out your sexy spring shoes for a chance to win some great prizes! Smiling Stiletto is a free social organization for women who love shoes and fashion!

Along with some great spring and summer fashions on display, there will be special shopping opportunities from:

  • Bittersweet Jewels
  • Fetysh Shoes and Accessories
  • Mary Kay Cosmetics by Kim Sviontek
  • Thirty-One Gifts by Kelly Fennell

Be sure to enter a raffle for a $2,500 California Closets gift certificate among other prizes! The raffle will benefit Project Smile, the non profit helping children in traumatic events.

There is plenty of free parking available.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the venue. I am hosting the event!
item.name: Ladies Night at California Closets: Comp Cocktails, Apps, Prizes and More!
